attributes.action: Make Joanna Lumley a Dame in the next Honours list
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think Joanna Lumley should be honoured with a Dameship as she has against all odds fought tooth and nail to help to get Support for Gurkhas, All without having to resort to dirty tricks.The Gurkhas offered their lives for this country and many already have died over the years. They are an Honourable race and that is what Joanna is selflessly fighting for, Their right for justice and equality.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
